name: bio-ferm Biotechnologische Entwicklung und Produktion GmbH
goal:
bio-ferm is working on the international product registration and marketing of innovative biotechnological plant protection products in viticulture, pome fruit, berries and tomatos.

The company bio-ferm is part of ERBER Group, an Austrian biotech company with headquarter in Getzersdorf (Lower Austria).
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Food Safety, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Follow up on the REFIT of Regulation 1107/09  and related legislation
